page.title: 06WORKING IN SANTON DOWNHAM
page.content: The only employment locally is with the F.C. or the three tenanted farms in the area. The farms are basically arable and grow mostly carrots and sugar beet; a small number of cattle are grazed on a few acres by the river. Other jobs are in Brandon, Thetford or other local towns. Until about 10 years ago, flint was still being worked for gun flints. Although the knapping was done in Brandon, the flint was quarried in an area near Lingheath and traces of pits can still be found in the S.W. corner of the block.
